name: Sam
text: Great.^9 While a single nurse or doctor can handle minor patients,^5 patients with moderate injuries need either two nurses,^5 or a doctor.^9

name: Luke
text: Once in awhile we'll get a severe patient.^9 Usually due to their critical condition we'll need at least one nurse to stabilize them and a doctor to help properly treat them.^9 Thankfully the past month has been mostly uneventful --^9 let's hope it stays that way.
